official-title.#text:
To require the submission to the Congress of annual
		  reports on the tobacco user fees assessed and collected under section 919 of
		  the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Transparency in Tobacco User Fees Act
			 of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by
			 adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 919
			 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:919

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall, with respect to such fiscal year, prepare and
				submit to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Committee on Energy and Commerce of the House of Representatives
Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions of the Senate

text.#text:
Beginning with fiscal year 2014, not later than 120 days
				after the end of each fiscal year for which fees are collected under this
				section, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall, with respect to the fiscal year involved,
				include at a minimum the following:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:919/ss:f/p:1

text.#text:
The total amount
				of fees assessed and collected under this section.

A description of
				how such fees have been, or are intended to be, used.

The total amount
				of fees assessed and collected under this section which have not been
				obligated.

The total amount
				of fees assessed and collected under this section which have been obligated,
				but have not been expended.

Of the fees assessed and collected under
				this section, the portion of such fees which have been, or are intended to be,
				provided to public or private entities outside of the Federal
				Government.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:910

text.#text:
The total number
				of tobacco products for which an application is received, or an order is
				issued, under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:910

text.#text:
the number of such
				applications disposed of; and

the number of
				such applications which remain pending.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
) for which an
				application is received, or an order is issued, under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:911/ss:b
Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:911

text.#text:
The total number
				of modified risk tobacco products (as defined in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act/s:911

text.#text:
the number of such
				applications disposed of; and

the number of
				such applications which remain
				pending.
